name: ROBLOX 2019 [Description]
description:
I haven't checked stylish for a few months, and now that I came back, I discovered that there were lots of bugs. I don't have the time and interest to work on this theme currently. 27/5

Decided to take a much more "modern" approach this time, there's still a lot planned, so stay tuned. (you will also, finally, be able to change the background)

user.name: kickedbyconsole
user.about: I've been around here for about a year, haven't done much to my theme since October. I'm now starting to make a new theme.

additional_info:
Changelog;
- 25/02/2018 // I hope I've fixed the problem with the theme not working, let me know if it still doesn't work!
- 12/01/2018 // Public release!



Credits;
